data.system_settings: Macbook Pro 2015 Screen resolution: 15,4-inch (2880 x 1800), MacOS Sierra: Version 10.13.1
data.actual_result: There is a little gap in the upper corners
data.short_description: The corner of role addind doesnt fill properly when someone is playing a game (check attachment)
data.steps_to_repro: - Find someone that is playing a game - Make sure he is kinda at the bottom of the players list so the role add menu will be on top and not below - Have role add permissions - See the little corners not properly filled
